articles.summary: Overnight Ukrainian Drone Attacks on Russia Spark Fires, Disrupt Highway Traffic Damage from a Ukrainian drone attack in the Kursk region. Overnight Ukrainian drone attacks on the Kursk and Voronezh regions sparked fires in residential buildings and disrupted traffic on a major highway, regional officials said early on Monday.
